mapper.sql: PersonID, FirstName, MiddleName, LastName, Affiliation1, Affiliation2, Email1, Email2, Telephone1, Telephone2, Fax, Address, ZipCode, City, StateOrProvince, Website1, Website2, TitleID, DegreeID, CountryID, GenderID, SmallPhotoFileName, BigPhotoFileName, MSN, ResearchAreas, Email1IsReleased, Email2IsReleased, AcademicTitle, MembershipWebsite, MembershipWebsiteIsReleased, CVFileName, SmallPhotoIsConfirmed, LocalFirstName, LocalLastName, LocalAffiliation1, LocalLanguageID, IsUnUsefulEmail, Department, QQ, WeChat
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from T_Person
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
